com.fns.grivet.model

Interface Auditable<U>

  • Type Parameters:
    U - the auditing type. Typically some kind of user; or reference to user's identifier
    All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Attribute, Audited, Class, ClassAttribute, NamedQuery

    public interface Auditable<U>
extends Serializable
    Interface for Auditable entities. Allows storing and retrieving creation and update information. The changing instance (typically some user) is to be defined by a Generics definition.
    Author:
    Chris Phillipson

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      U getCreatedBy()
      Returns the user who created this entity.
      LocalDateTime getCreatedTime()
      Returns the creation time of the entity.
      U getUpdatedBy()
      Returns the user who last modified the entity.
      LocalDateTime getUpdatedTime()
      Returns the time of the last modification.
      void setCreatedBy(U createdBy)
      Sets the user who created this entity.
      void setCreatedTime(LocalDateTime createdTime)
      Sets the creation time of the entity.
      void setUpdatedBy(U updatedBy)
      Sets the user who last modified the entity.
      void setUpdatedTime(LocalDateTime updatedTime)
      Sets the time of the last modification.

      • getCreatedTime

        LocalDateTime getCreatedTime()
        Returns the creation time of the entity.
        Returns:
        the createdTime; a date-time without a time-zone in the ISO-8601 calendar system

      • setCreatedTime

        void setCreatedTime(LocalDateTime createdTime)
        Sets the creation time of the entity.
        Parameters:
        createdTime - the creation date to set; a date-time without a time-zone in the ISO-8601 calendar system

      • getUpdatedBy

        U getUpdatedBy()
        Returns the user who last modified the entity.
